name: eMailHelper
0:
”Alexa, open email helper”
”Alexa, ask email helper to check delivery status”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: email helper
des:
Skill will help in automation of email related activities in our organization (Siemens GDC India). All IT support managers would be able to perform day-to-day email related work with the help of this.
This will not send any actual email but it will do a voice announcement of emails so that relevant service engineers on the floor can draft and send emails accordingly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
